block.p: LEAD: An article on Wednesday about the economics of fighting acid rain misidentified one environmental organization and gave an incorrect location of another. The group that represents a traditional approach to regulating air pollution is the Natural Resources Defense Council, not Defense Fund.

LEAD: An article on Wednesday about the economics of fighting acid rain misidentified one environmental organization and gave an incorrect location of another. The group that represents a traditional approach to regulating air pollution is the Natural Resources Defense Council, not Defense Fund.

An article on Wednesday about the economics of fighting acid rain misidentified one environmental organization and gave an incorrect location of another. The group that represents a traditional approach to regulating air pollution is the Natural Resources Defense Council, not Defense Fund.
The Environmental Defense Fund is based in New York, not on the West Coast.
